name: Poziom
description:
Welcome to the Poziom: There is only One Level!

In this game you play as a lonely elephant which wants to escape from the endless first level. You have to beat 5 levels by going through the escape door found somewhere on the level. In case you can not reach somewhere, you can pick up the mushroom that helps jump higher!

How to move:
  • Use A and D to move the elephant and
  • Use W to jump. If you die you can
  • Press F or click the button to respawn and try again! 
  • To open the Pause Menu use Escape.
  • And to input the code use arrow keys

All graphics were made in MS Paint! Glory to MS Paint! And don't forget to leave a comment and give me your feedback!
